title: Pokemon XY - Pikachu and the Pokemon Musicians (Dub)
alternative_title: Pikachu to Pokémon ongakutai; ピカチュウとポケモンおんがくたい; Pikachu and the Pokémon Music Squad; Pikachu and the Pokémon Band
description: Pikachu and the Pokémon Music Squad is the Pikachu short that debuted alongside Pokémon The Movie - Hoopa and the Clash of Ages.
